content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electronic Circuit Factory at position(9.5, 11.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) that moves items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) making electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) that moves finished products
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 801 electronic circuits

### Power Generation System around position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Water pipe system at position(-9.5, 23.5) connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) running on coal
- Steam pipe system at position(-5.5, 24.5) connecting boiler to steam engine
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected electricity network with poles distributing power

### Science Pack Processing at position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(0.5, 28.5) with automation and logistic science packs loaded
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding the lab
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing 865 automation science packs and 347 logistic science packs

### Idle Smelting Area around position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of three currently inactive stone furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Research prerequisite errors
- Research technologies in correct order following the prerequisite tree:
  - Need engine before fluid-handling
  - Need fluid-handling before oil-processing
  - Need oil-processing before plastics
  - Need plastics before advanced-electronics
  - Need advanced-electronics before chemical-science-pack
  - Need optics before solar-energy
  - Need advanced-oil-processing before lubricant
  - Need lubricant before electric-engine

### Entity connection errors
- When connecting entities with pipes, ensure there is a valid connection path between the source and destination
- Verify pipe connections are possible given the entity orientations and connection points

### Resource shortage errors
- Ensure assembling machines have all required ingredients before starting production
- The electronic circuit assembler needs both iron plates and copper cables to function

### Already researched technology errors
- Avoid attempting to research technologies that are already completed:
  - Logistics science pack
  - Fast inserter
  - Military science
  - Electronics
